dfischer.proxysniffer

Class ProxyRecorderSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • dfischer.proxysniffer.ProxyRecorderSettings

  • public class ProxyRecorderSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    Configuration data about the proxy recorder. Hint this configuration is only used during recording a Web surfing session, but not during executing a load test program. However, some configuration data may also be transferred to the java code of a load test program (when generating a load test program).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String RECORDER_SETTINGS_FILENAME
      The name of the configuration file which contains all data of this class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Create a new instance with default values.

    • Method Detail

      • setOutboundProxyTimeout

        public void setOutboundProxyTimeout(int outboundProxyTimeout)
        Set the timeout in seconds for outbound connections to the web servers. Used by Apica BNet only. Normally = no timeout for all standard purposes.
        Parameters:
        outboundProxyTimeout - the timeout in seconds, or -1 = no timeout (standard configuration).
        Since:
        V5.2-U

      • getOutboundProxyTimeout

        public int getOutboundProxyTimeout()
        Get the timeout in seconds for outbound connections to the web servers. Used by Apica BNet only. Normally = no timeout for all standard purposes.
        Returns:
        the timeout in seconds, or -1 = no timeout (standard configuration)
        Since:
        V5.2-U

      • setRecordFailedTransmitRequests

        public void setRecordFailedTransmitRequests(boolean recordFailedTransmitRequests)
        Set if requests that cannot be transmitted to the web servers are recorded. Used by Apica BNet only. Normally = false for all standard purposes.
        Parameters:
        recordFailedTransmitRequests - true = requests that cannot be transmitted to the web servers are recorded, of false = standard configuration
        Since:
        V5.2-U

      • isRecordFailedTransmitRequests

        Returns:
        true = requests that cannot be transmitted to the web servers are recorded, of false = standard configuration
        Since:
        V5.2-U

        Set a cascaded next proxy.
        Parameters:

        public NextProxyConfig getNextProxyConfig()

      • setSslProtocolVersion

        public void setSslProtocolVersion(java.lang.String sslProtocolVersion)
        Set the SSL protocol version that is used by the proxy recorder.
        Parameters:
        sslProtocolVersion - the SSL protocol version that is used by the proxy recorder. You can pass "v3", "tls", "tls11", "tls12" or "all". Default = "all" (v3/tls/tls11/tls12).

      • getSslProtocolVersion

        public java.lang.String getSslProtocolVersion()
        Get the SSL protocol version that is used by the proxy recorder.
        Returns:
        "v3", "tls", "tls11", "tls12" or "all"

      • setSslTunnelTimeout

        public void setSslTunnelTimeout(int sslTunnelTimeout)
        Set the response timeout per HTTPS URL call. If this timeout expires the corresponding HTTPS request will be aborted by the proxy recorder.
        Parameters:
        sslTunnelTimeout - the response timeout per HTTPS URL call in seconds

        Returns:

      • setRetrySSLHandShake

        public void setRetrySSLHandShake(boolean retrySSLHandShake)
        Set if retry SSL handshake is needed.
        Parameters:
        retrySSLHandShake - true = allow the recorder to retry SSL handshake with different ssl protocol versions in case of a failure with all option
        Since:
        V5.5-C

      • isRetrySSLHandShake

        public boolean isRetrySSLHandShake()
        Get if retry SSL handshake is needed.
        Returns:

        Since:
        V5.5-C
